pullrequest.title: [Gazebo9] Fixing paths related issues on Windows build.

content.raw: I've seen those timeouts recur more frequently than I would like, but they are unrelated to this pull request, so you can ignore them. I didn't see any new test failures that I think are related to this. The only issue I could see is the style / line length
content.html: I've seen those timeouts recur more frequently than I would like, but they are unrelated to this pull request, so you can ignore them. I didn't see any new test failures that I think are related to this. The only issue I could see is the style / line length
